menu.name: .wikipedia
menu.function: async function getInpo(cari) {return new Promise(async (gaas, err) => {const Res = [];const queryParams = querystring.stringify({action: 'query',format: 'json',list: 'search',srsearch: cari,srlimit: 10,srwhat: 'text'});try {const response = await axios.get(`https://id.wikipedia.org/w/api.php?${queryParams}`);const data = response.data;if (data.query && data.query.search) {data.query.search.forEach((item, index) => {const tex = item.snippet + '<';const extractedText = tex.match(/>(.*?)</g).map(match => match.slice(1, -1));const formattedResult = `${index + 1}. ${extractedText.join(' ')}`;Res.push(formattedResult);});}gaas(Res.join('\n'))} catch (error) {console.error('Error:', error);err(Res.join('\n'))}})}
